tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_prediction (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  historical_demand INT,
  predicted_demand INT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    demand INT
)

CREATE TABLE seasonal_data (
    month VARCHAR,
    season VARCHAR,
    demand_factor FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE future_demand_predictions (
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_demand INT
)
